definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Converter is the important part of the power accumulator battery testing system.
sentences.chinese: 變流器是動力蓄電池組測試系統重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Steady-state analysis of soft-switching converters is discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 討論軟開關變流器的穩態分析。

sentences.english: The grid simulator adopts the four-quadrant converter consists of back-to-back mode.
sentences.chinese: 該裝置採用背靠背方式的四象限變流器組成。

sentences.english: The high-pressure sodium lamp is dimmed by varying the input voltage of the inverter.
sentences.chinese: 高壓鈉燈的調光則藉由改變變流器的輸入電壓。

sentences.english: Test results show that the converter has reached design requirement.
sentences.chinese: 試驗結果表明，該變流器達到了設計要求。

sentences.english: Simultaneously, four-quadrant converter capacity problem's simulation and analysis have been done, too.
sentences.chinese: 同時還給出了四象限變流器容量問題的分析與仿真。

sentences.english: Phaseshifting reactor is a new method for converter power supply systems harmonic suppression.
sentences.chinese: 移相電抗器是變流器供電系統諧波抑制的一種新方法。

sentences.english: This thesis aims at implementation of high frequency linked inverter based-on selected harmonic elimination.
sentences.chinese: 本論文旨在研製一基於特定諧波消除之高頻鏈變流器。

sentences.english: The experimental results show that the static inverter achieves high performance targ…
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果證明該靜止變流器有高的技術性能指標。
